title: Autodesk Revit Architecture 2998
description:
1. Install Autocad Revit Architecture 2008 (launch setup.exe)
  Click on Configure (after accepting license agreement ..)
  Select as Default Units: Metric <--- IMPORTANT
  Select Stand-alone-license
  Click on Configuration Complete and then Install


2. Start Autodesk Revit Architecture 2008 and Select Activate the Product
  when ask for activation,  select Enter an Activation Code
  Use as serial : 697-12354321 or 697-98989898 or 697-69696969
  Write down the request code.

3. Fire up the xforce keygen and generate an activation code
  based on your request code. Continue the registration process
  Copy and paste your generated activation code ..
  Restart Autocad

4. Enjoy!

NB: dotnetfx / directx / mdac .. all got ripped so you need them installed and up to date.
DWG viewers & co can be d/l free of charge from adesk sites, just search for dwg
